text:
An ‘Inter-faith prayer meet for world peace and welfare of society’ was organised by Developers India here on Friday. Prince of Arcot Nawab Mohammed Abdul Ali said people have to make an effort to understand religious beliefs and values of other faiths, a release said.

Former principal secretary Swaran Singh, Michael J. Gorbatov, vice-consul and director, Russian Centre for Science and Culture, Ambika Ravindran, nursing director of Frontier Lifeline Hospital and Harbhajan Singh, founder secretary and convenor of Developers India spoke.
title: Inter-faith prayer meet
